# Showcase & Portfolio Criteria for AI Agents

Guide AI agents to optimize for professional portfolio value and GitHub/LinkedIn promotion.

## Portfolio Goals
**Target Audience**: Hiring managers, technical peers, industry professionals
**Demonstrate**: Full-stack ML engineering, modern architecture, financial domain expertise, AI-assisted development

## Code Quality Standards
- **Architecture**: Hexagonal patterns, SOLID principles, microservices
- **Professional**: Type safety, 80%+ test coverage, documentation, ruff/mypy compliance
- **ML Engineering**: Feature stores, model management, real-time processing, monitoring

## Showcase Priorities
**Technical Breadth**: Backend engineering, ML pipelines, DevOps, financial domain
**Unique Value**: Finance + ML + Software engineering integration
**Professional Quality**: Enterprise-grade code, scalable design, production concerns

## AI Agent Focus
**Code Reviews**: Prioritize architectural elegance, professional standards, educational value
**Documentation**: Highlight decision rationale, trade-offs, scalability considerations
**Features**: Recommend technically sophisticated, real-world applicable solutions
